gross_motor_section.question_text: Does your child walk up stairs one foot per step?
Can your child jump forward with both feet together?
Does your child stand on one foot for at least two seconds without holding onto anything?
Can your child kick a ball forward without losing balance?
Does your child climb on and off furniture without help?
Can your child pedal a tricycle or similar ride-on toy?

fine_motor_section.question_text: Does your child use a crayon to draw a simple shape like a circle?
